General.Name: Mazhar Zorlu Holding AS
General.Description: Mazhar Zorlu Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, marketing, and sale of various plastic pipes and components in Turkey. It offers PVC and polyethylene pipes, and fittings and spare parts; and construction, agriculture, and infrastructure related pipes and fittings. The company is also involved in acquiring and selling of shares of the companies. Mazhar Zorlu Holding A.S. was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.
General.Address: Street No.6 Atatürk Organized Ind. Zone, Izmir, Turkey, 10003
